successes.title: Sprite: portable and rugged.  A totally different drone.
successes.description: Sprite is a completely different kind of unmanned aerial vehicle. Portable, rugged, powerful, and easy to use.  A tool, not a toy.

Pledges.description: Calling our backers with a 3D printer!  Get this 3D print file that will give you your very own miniature desktop model of Sprite.  It will be about 4 inches (10cm) tall and feature rotating rotors.  Just to be clear...this Reward is for a digital print file, not for a physical model!  : )  Feel free to print as many as you want and send them to your friends!

Make Sprite do what you want it to do...whatever that is.  The Payload Developer Kit includes all of the digital files you'll need to design and print a custom bulkhead for Sprite.  It will attach to the bottom of the Main Module, interface with other modules like the optional Light Ring and LaunchPod landing gear, and provide a watertight seal to keep things dry inside.  There's also an accommodation for power and data connections.  Any development done with the PDK needs to be done under a non-commercial, open source license.  We'll ask you to post your designs to Ascent's website for distribution to other members of the Sprite community to use.
Commemorate our launch with Ascent's Kickstarter Launch T-Shirt.  Featuring Sprite and Ascent AeroSystem's logo.  Color: Navy.  Available in S, M, L, XL, and XXL.
A quality zippered hoodie sweatshirt with Ascent AeroSystem's logo.  Color: Charcoal Grey.  Available in S, M, L, XL and XXL.

Your very own Sprite™, the most portable, rugged sUAV in the world.  Sprite™ will arrive tested and ready to fly using your own compatible Android tablet or smartphone, or a PC.  You'll just need to  download the free DroidPlanner or MissionPlanner software to program autonomous flights, or to fly manually in real-time.  Please note that a LiPo charger is needed before you can fly Sprite™.

A conventional R/C transmitter is not necessary, and one is not included in this reward.  If you would like to fly Sprite using a traditional R/C transmitter, please consider getting the EXPLORER reward package below.
Sprite™ is FPV (First Person View) ready!
